synopsis.text: Ministry of Fisheries launches an ambitious project in the future, as Earth's oceans become devoid of fish, leaving only whales. In Onomichi, Hiroshima, giant Universe Fish Tanks are established in space to cultivate and study aquatic life. The Onomichi Universe Fishery Union is formed to train space fishermen, with a particular focus on recruiting women to promote gender equality in the workforce. Our tale follows the journey of six young women selected as candidates for this unique profession, as they strive to become skilled Space Fishers and uncover the mysteries of the cosmos. Join them as they navigate through challenges and growth, from the charming streets of Onomichi City to the vast expanses of space.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
